Quantifind was founded by two Ph.D. atomic physicists. We're pioneering the science of Intent Forecasting and applying analytic techniques drawn from classical statistics, probability theory, natural language processing, and machine learning. Quantifind is a first to market solution that is going to help companies get to the truth behind what is driving their revenues.

InnovaitonMuse consulting works with both people and organizations to help drive change.  All companies have two things; their products/services and their balance sheet.  Between these two key corporate drivers is a hole.  This hole is made up things like culture, infrastructure and tangible solutions.  At InnovationMuse Consulting, the goal is to help companies see how their greatest asset, the people, can create what is needed to compete.  It is everyone's job to keep the hole filled by seamlessly connecting the great products and services that drive the companies' balance sheet to even greater heights.

Every Monday Matters (EMM) is a mega-community dedicated to social transformation– individually, communally, and globally. EMM is a catalyst committed to creating an opportunity for people to connect, curate, belong, share, inspire, and access a shared medium to positivelyimpact the world… one person, one action, one Monday at a time.

As Chief Evangelist at NetBase I am a subject matter expert in the area of applying social media in order to generate business value.  As the voice of the customer representative for NetBase I work across all organizations focusing on diving sales, marketing new social media products and through collaborating with those interested in this powerful new data set.

Barry Morsillo

Barry Morsillo is a greater collaborative partner.  When we worked together, I could always count on him to work together to make things go faster, make ideas bigger and to make all of it fun.  It is rare to have a business partner that does all three as Barry does and it made going to work each an every day better.  He is doggedly focused on results, he always brings the needed structure and process to what is happening and his openness to new ideas and support give him an edge many don't have.  I would work alongside Barry anytime as we still stay in touch which to me is the measure of a great sales partner!

February 2, 2017, Malcolm was senior to Alexandre but didn’t manage directly

Alex is a collaborator at heart and when you are dealing with innovation this is a key skill that separates him.  He is always willing to chip in where needed, facilitate others towards the goal at hand and keeps others informed to create the synergy needed to accomplish tough tasks.  It is this skill that separates Alex from others because his selflessness and commitment make him special.  In a world where everyone is trying to step on each other to get somewhere, Alex is unique because he brings a strong sense of winning while bringing others along for the victory.
